title: Bug 114903Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: Description:Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialogSteps to reproduce:1. Create several report parameters, only set default value for them.2. Drag them to Layout3. Preview and click Show Report Parameters button.Expected result:Default values are shown in value box, so I can modify the parameter which Iwant to change.Actual result:In Enter Parameters dialog, all values were empty, I just wanted to modify oneparameter and found that I had to input all values.
